description.name: WP Squared[tm]
description.tagline: High-Performance WordPress Management Made Easy. Powered by cPanel
description.short: WP Squared is the leading web hosting control panel and is the hosting platform of choice by more web hosts than any other.
description.long:
Fully integrated with WHMCS for streamlined billing, customer management, and efficient operations

Main Features:
Automatic WP Squared Account Provisioning
Professional Invoices & Recurring Payment Collection
Automated Suspensions, Termination, and Upgrades
Automated SSL Provisioning & Installation
Integrated Disk & Bandwidth Usage Reporting
